grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 肩高【ケンコウ】withers (height from ground to shoulder blades in animals)
肩甲骨【ケンコウコツ】shoulder blade, scapula
路肩【ロカタ】shoulder (of a road), berm
強肩【キョウケン】strong throwing arm
kun reading compounds: 肩書き【かたがき】title (e.g. Doctor, Professor, Lord), job title, position (in a company), degree, status, rank
路肩【ろかた】shoulder (of a road), berm
相肩【あいかた】partner, someone who shares one's load
